syntax.syntax_item: [res, message] = dlgeneratemake(destinationdir, libname, c_cpp_files, includes, defines, external_libraries, build_configuration, c_flags, cxx_flags)

param_input_item.param_description: a string: destination directory where is the makefile to call.

param_output_item.param_description: a logical: true if makefile execution was successfully.
a string: empty if makefile execution was successfully or an error message.

description.p: dlmake used to provide an multiplatform way to build C/C++.
